metadata.name: Aid Type Vocabulary
metadata.description: The AidTypeVocabulary codelist defines a range of external codelists which themselves provide codes and descriptions for aid type.

1.name: OECD DAC
1.description: List of codes provided by the OECD DAC used to distinguish types of aid

2.name: Earmarking Category
2.description: This vocabulary has been created by IATI and is derived from the Grand Bargain Earmarking Modality codelist

3.name: Earmarking Modality
3.description: Codes A to L replicated directly from Grand Bargain document found in Annex 1 (pg.16)

4.name: Cash and Voucher Modalities
4.description: This vocabulary has been created by IATI, following agreements and recommendations of the Tracking Cash and Voucher Assistance (CVA) Working Group.
